00046 namespace detail {
00052     typedef boost::uintmax_t doubledigit_t;
00053 
00059     typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00060         digit_t;
00061 
00064     const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00065     const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00066     const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00067     const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00068     const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00074     struct data_t;
00075 
00077     struct token { };
00078 
00080     struct base_random_generator {
00081         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00082         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00083     };
00084 
00086     template <class T>
00087     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00088         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00089         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00090         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00091             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00092                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00093         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00094         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00095         gen_t gen;
00096     };
00097 
00099     void set_random_generator(base_random_generator *obj);

00105     unsigned int get_random();

00703 // Template function definitions
00704 
00705 namespace core {
00706 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00707     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00708     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00709 {
00710     if (n >= 0) {
00711         if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00712             _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00713         else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00714     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()) {
00715         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00716         // what you'd think it is.
00717         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-(n+1)));
00718         _set_negative(true);
00719         --(*this);
00720     } else {
00721         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-n));
00722         _set_negative(true);
00723     }
00724 }
00725 } // namespace core
00726 
00727 namespace core {
00728 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00729     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00730     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00731 {
00732     if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00733         _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00734     else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00735 }
00736 } // namespace core
00737 
00750 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00751     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00752     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00753 {
00754     data=0;
00755     try {
00756         *this=integer(core::integer(n));
00757     } catch (std::exception&) {
00758         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00759         delete data;
00760         data=0;
00761     }
00762 }
00763 
00776 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00777     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00778     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00779 {
00780     data=0;
00781     try {
00782         *this=integer(core::integer(n));
00783     } catch (std::exception&) {
00784         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00785         delete data;
00786         data=0;
00787     }
00788 }
00789 
00790 namespace core {
00791 template <typename T>
00792 T to(const integer& n) {
00793     if (n < (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()
00794         || n > (std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())
00795             throw too_big("value out of range for requested conversion");
00796 
00797     T rval=0;
00798     size_t len=n._get_length();
00799     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x)
00800         rval=static_cast<T>((rval * detail::digit_overflowbit)
00801             + n._get_digit(len-x-1));
00802     if (n.sign() < 0) rval *= -1;
00803     return rval;
00804 }
00805 } // namespace core
00806 
00819 template <typename T>
00820 T to(const integer& n) {
00821     try {
00822         return to<T>(core::integer(n));
00823     } catch (std::exception&) {
00824         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00825         else return 0;
00826     }
00827 }
00828 
00842 template <typename T>
00843 void set_random_generator(T *gen) {
00844     detail::random_generator<T> *obj=new detail::random_generator<T>(gen);
00845     detail::set_random_generator(obj);
00846 }
00847 
00850 namespace core {
00851 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00852 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00853     traits>& out, const integer& n)
00854 {
00855     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00856         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00857         : 10);
00858     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00859 
00860     int nsign=n.sign();
00861     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00862 
00863     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00864         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00865 
00866         if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00867         else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00868         else if (base==8) out << "0";
00869 
00870         out << to_string(abs(n), base, upperCase);
00871     } else {
00872         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00873     }
00874     return out;
00875 }
00876 } // namespace core
00877 
00878 namespace core {
00879 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00880 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00881     traits>& in, integer& n)
00882 {
00883     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00884     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00885     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00886     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00887 
00888     size_t base=autobase;
00889     if (count==1) {
00890         if (hex) base=16;
00891         else if (oct) base=8;
00892         else base=10;
00893     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00894     // else auto-base
00895 
00896     std::string s;
00897     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00898         in.ignore();
00899     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00900         in.ignore();
00901         s.push_back('-');
00902     }
00903 
00904     if (base==autobase) {
00905         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00906             in.ignore();
00907             int c=in.peek();
00908             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00909                 in.ignore();
00910                 base=16;
00911             } else base=8;
00912         } else base=10;
00913     }
00914 
00915     while (in) {
00916         int c=in.peek();
00917         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00918             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00919             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00920                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00921         {
00922             in.ignore();
00923             s.push_back(char(c));
00924         } else break;
00925     }
00926 
00927     token allow=allow_exceptions();
00928     try {
00929         integer testValue=from_string(s, base);
00930         n=testValue;
00931     } catch (std::exception&) {
00932         // Catch invalid strings
00933         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00934     }
00935 
00936     return in;
00937 }
00938 } // namespace core
00940 
00943 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00944 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00945     traits>& out, const integer& n)
00946 {
00947     if (n.is_nan()) {
00948         out << detail::nan_text;
00949         return out;
00950     } else {
00951         return core::operator<<(out, core::integer(n));
00952     }
00953 }
00954 
00955 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00956 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00957     traits>& in, integer& n)
00958 {
00959     if (in.peek()=='#') {
00960         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
00961         char buffer[6];
00962         std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
00963         buffer[size]=0;
00964         std::string str(buffer);
00965 
00966         if (str==detail::nan_text) n=integer::nan();
00967         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00968     } else {
00969         core::integer nn;
00970         core::operator>>(in, nn);
00971         if (in) n=nn;
00972     }
00973 
00974     return in;
00975 }
00977 
00978 } // namespace xint
00979 } // namespace boost
00980 
00981 #endif // BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_H
